short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Briefly.ai: Turn content into concise points. AI-powered Chrome extension helps you quickly digest any webpage or uploaded file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock the power of web content with Briefly.ai, a Chrome extension that distills complex information from any webpage into clear, bullet-point summaries. By harnessing cutting-edge AI, this tool enables users to swiftly grasp essential insights, making it ideal for professionals, researchers, and anyone keen on optimizing their online reading time. Briefly.ai transforms your browsing experience, allowing you to stay informed and focused without the burden of lengthy reads.
